columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: This column is used to track problems currently or previously linked to the plan (via episodes of care).

columns.name: PROBLEM_LINKED_TO_PLAN_YN
columns.description: This column is used to store whether the problem and diagnoses on this line are linked to the plan. This column is updated for plans of active and future statuses.
